about_the_game:
To build the ultimate railway empire, you need Ticket to Ride’s Round the World Ticket! With Ticket to Ride’s Round the World Ticket, you’ll get immediate access to the currently released expansions. You will also be granted access to all initially planned expansions as they release, for a total of 10 expansions!

Travel across North America, visit Europe, journey to the Nordic countries, discover India, create your story in Legendary Asia, get groovy in San Francisco and explore Switzerland.

USA 1910 Ticket Pack:

Travel back to 1910 America with more tickets and three new game modes: USA 1910, Big Cities and Mega Game.

Europe Expansion:

Play as Erika Ford and Bertie Hawkes as you tunnel through the Alps and claim ferry routes. Bonus content Europa 1912 Ticket Pack adds new game modes and tickets too!

Nordic Expansion:

Join Mina Larsen and Morten Jensen and ride across the northern reaches, connecting colourful cities in the snow as you go.

India Expansion:

Accompany Bhaskar Singh and Dr Aanandi Johri around the vibrant cities of India, crafting multiple routes to earn the Mandala bonus.

Legendary Asia Expansion:

Make new friends in Wang Ling and Lê Chinh, add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet and aim for the Asian Explorer bonus!

San Francisco City Expansion:

Jump aboard a tram or get a lift from fashion designer Summer Ashbury or silver-screen icon Felix Woods as you take in the city sights and seek out Souvenirs.

Switzerland Expansion:

Head out with photographer Ayla Vogel and watchmaker Elias Hartmann and connect Switzerland’s neighbouring countries.

EACH EXPANSION INCLUDES:

An amazingly detailed 3D map

Unique new characters

New locomotives

New carriages

Future expansions:

Including fan favourites and never-before-seen exclusives to the video game!

Your railway empire is history in the making!

package_groups.title: Buy Ticket to Ride® - Round the World Ticket

short_description: All aboard for the ultimate Ticket to Ride™ adventure! Build railway networks around the globe, through North America, Europe, and beyond! With the Round the World Ticket, you'll get access to a total of 10 expansions (as they are released)!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
